resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/107512</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>107512</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086021</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Evidence of rising sea level: Coastal erosion and plant community changes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Beweis des steigenden Meeresspiegels: 
Küstenabnutzung- und Betriebsgemeinschaftsänderungen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Évidence de niveau de la mer se levant : 
Changements côtiers de la communauté d'érosion et d'usine</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Evidência do nível de mar levantando-se: 
Mudanças litorais da comunidade da erosão e da planta</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Prova del livello del mare aumentante: 
Cambiamenti litoranei della Comunità della pianta e di 
erosione</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Στοιχεία της αυξανόμενης στάθμης θάλασσας: 
Παράκτια διάβρωση και κοινοτικές αλλαγές εγκαταστάσεων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Evidencia del nivel del mar de levantamiento: 
Cambios costeros de la comunidad de la erosión y de la planta</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">A Carolina Environmental Diversity Explorations "virtual field trip" that examines the causes and effects of changes in sea level, both short-term (as a result of storms) and long-term (as a result of climate change).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Science and Technology</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Eine virtuellen Carolina fangen die 
Klimaverschiedenartigkeit-Erforschungen "Reise" auf, die die Ursachen 
und die Effekte der Änderungen im Meeresspiegel überprüft, 
kurzfristig (resultierend aus Stürmen) und im Long-term (resultierend
aus Klimaänderung).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Explorations environnementales "voyage d'une 
diversité de la Caroline de zone virtuel" qui examinent les causes et
les effets des changements du niveau de la mer, à court terme (en 
raison de donne l'assaut à) et du long terme (en raison du changement 
de climat).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Explorações ambientais "desengate de uma 
diversidade de Carolina de campo virtual" que examinam as causas e os 
efeitos das mudanças no nível de mar,  a curto prazo (em 
conseqüência das tempestades) e no prazo (em conseqüência da 
mudança do clima).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Esplorazioni ambientali "viaggio di diversità 
della Carolina di campo virtuale" che esaminano le cause e gli effetti
dei cambiamenti nel livello del mare, sia di breve durata (come 
conseguenza delle tempeste) che nel lungo termine (come conseguenza 
del cambiamento di clima).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εξερευνήσεις μιας περιβαλλοντικές ποικιλομορφίας της 
Καρολίνας "εικονικό ταξίδι πεδίων" που εξετάζουν τα αίτια και τα
αιτιατά των αλλαγών στη στάθμη θάλασσας, και βραχυπρόθεσμη (ως 
αποτέλεσμα των θυελλών) και μακροπρόθεσμο (ως αποτέλεσμα της 
αλλαγής κλίματος).</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Exploraciones ambientales "disparo al campo de una
diversidad de Carolina virtual" que examinan las causas y los efectos 
de cambios en el nivel del mar, a corto plazo (como resultado de 
tormentas) y el largo plazo (como resultado de cambio del clima).</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wissenschaft und Technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">La Science et technologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ciência e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Scienza e tecnologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επιστήμη και τεχνολογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ciencia y tecnología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <metaMetadata>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1765086021</entry>
          </identifier>
          <language>en</language>
        </metaMetadata>
        <educational>
          <language>en</language>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Custom License</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
  <manifestation>
    <identifier>
      <catalog>manifestation-cmr-id</catalog>
      <entry>107512</entry>
    </identifier>
    <name>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.manifestationNameValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>experience</value>
    </name>
    <item>
      <location>
        <uri>http://www.oercommons.org/libraries/evidence-of-rising-sea-level-coastal-erosion-and-plant-community-changes</uri>
      </location>
    </item>
  </manifestation>
</expression>
